name: aws-toolkit-vscode
displayName: AWS Toolkit - Amazon Q, CodeWhisperer, and more
description: Including Amazon Q, CodeWhisperer, CodeCatalyst, Application Composer, and support for Lambda, S3, CloudWatch Logs, CloudFormation, and many other services
engines: This field will be autopopulated from the core module during debugging and packaging.
contributes: This field will be autopopulated from the core module during debugging and packaging.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode production
scripts.buildScripts: npm run generateNonCodeFiles && npm run copyFiles
scripts.clean: ts-node ../../scripts/clean.ts dist/ LICENSE NOTICE quickStart* README* CHANGELOG.md
scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts && webpack --mode development
scripts.webWatch: npm run clean && npm run copyFiles --vueHr && webpack --config-name web --watch
scripts.webCompile: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts -- --vueHr && webpack --config-name web
scripts.package: npm run copyPackageJson && ts-node ../../scripts/package.ts && npm run restorePackageJson
scripts.watch: npm run clean && npm run buildScripts -- --vueHr && tsc -watch -p ./
